Author: Michele
Review Title: My recent transfer in late May to my…
Review Text: My recent transfer in late May to my cousin was stolen at the local moneygram location jn Jamaica. I initiated a case #30331732 which was closed in about 1 week stating there was no fraudulent activity. That was  completely incorrect when the money was picked up per your records on May 29th and my cousin did not go to th e location until May 30th. As a customer, I paid a fee to ensure the money would be secure and proper protocol followed with identification confirmed by the intended recipient. When my cousin arrived onMay 30th to pick up the funds she was told there was no money there and I, the sender would need to cobtact thd company to request a refund. The reps in the location refused to contact moneygram directly as directed by Moneygram and said it was a US issue. I'm disgusted at the insufficient and inadequate handing of the case and concern for me as a long time customer. I refuse to use moneygram in the future and find other means to assist my cousin.

Author: Larry
Review Title: Almost every time I try to send money…
Review Text: Almost every time I try to send money to Costa Rica, your local offices will not release the funds.   They want all kinds of information from me.   Where i work, what is my job, how much do I make.     Information that is none of their business.    Has happened many times.  I call your corporate office and am told I should not have to provide personal information and the money is available for pick up.   But your local offices still Don it release it.    I end up canceling the transfer and you keep my fees even though it is your fault it did it work.  You owe me about 6 fees to date.  This has happened over the last 3 years.  Now I am forced to use Western Union.Monygram responded and said they were sorry and regret the issues I have run into and that the fees should have been refunded on such a case.   BUT they still did not refund the fees.  They can see in their records the transactions I had to cancel.    Talk is cheap.   They were polite but fixed nothing and refunded nothing.   Disappointed in Monygram.

Review Title: [SOLVED] THE MONEY HAS NOT REACHED THE RECIPIENT AND MONEYGRAM INSISTS THAT THE TRANSACTION WAS SUCCESSFUL.
Review Text: [SOLVED] About the previous complaint made:I have just opened a complaint directly on your site. I believe that the complaint already explains everything:Dear Moneygram Support Team,I hereby request the money back into my bank account.It is unacceptable that the money from the transfer I made has not yet reached the recipient.Your customer support takes a long time and is terrible. I have already opened a first ticket about this problem and received an email that the transaction was completed successfully. However, the recipient claims that it hasn't arrived and can't withdraw the money because it simply hasn't dropped.I want the money back today, otherwise I will have to go to court.I urgently await your return.CASE NUMBER 30130919I received the following feedback from MoneyGram:Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback and for alerting us to the issue you experienced with your recent transaction. We have checked the case number referenced and see that this transaction has been completed as of May 26th. Should you need any further assistance, please reach back out to us. Thank you for using MoneyGram!The thing is: when the recipient tries to withdraw the money, he gets the following error: [error image in the link]. The user himself at the Moneygram branch says that he doesn't have any money and doesn't know what the problem could be. I tried to call the support but nobody answers, I went to the personal MoneyGram branch in my country and nobody knows how to solve the problem. Then finally I open a complaint online and you simply say that the transaction was completed successfully? KKKKKKKKK

Author: Mrs Anonymous
Review Text: Decided to use to transfer large amount as previous bank transfer went smoothly .Big mistake ; system said transfer completed , however receiver says not in bank account . Receiver contacted bank who verified no transfer of funds and nothing pending .Contacted money gram , was advised all banking details correct and funds should be in account but will investigate.Checked with receiver bank following day - still no money transferred.Email from money gram stating receiver  rejected transfer and money gram will request a refund to be sent to me , but could take 10 business days !!!! Contacted receiver bank again , they stated they have not rejected any transfer and no reason to reject.Who is telling the truth !!! Why wait 10 business days for a refund .I contacted customer services as the transfer was for a large amount and receiver relying on the cash . Short version of very long discussion with two customer service people . All I got was a completely scripted reply , can't do anything , money was rejected by receiver bank and just wait 10 days , sorry for inconvenience , why does it take 10 days when you can accept my money in 10 minutes !!! I just hope my money is paid back soon as really need to get it to my son .Maybe the company good for small monies but please don't use for larger amounts .I'm very nervous waiting for this money and I have contacted CEO of the company but no expectations of a reply .I will update this review when a conclusion is reached and just hope I don't have to take serious actions

Author: Marie Halliday
Review Text: I sent £3k through moneygram on 26th April 2023 to Gambia and my money is missing and moneygram is taking no responsibility for it. They have a system on the app to send money direct to the bank small money arrives but my £3k did not. Moneygram give it a reference but that reference means nothing once it leaves their account. Moneygram do not check where that money is going. I found out that the money cannot go to any bank as each bank needs a licence of which needs to be paid to moneygram and in a poor country like Gambia they can't afford it. So what happens it goes to a filter bank and there anything can happen to your money because money gram take no responsibility to ensure your funds are received by the person you intend. I am angry. Moneygram have a 2 tier complaint system because they don't know what they are doing and the reference does not mean anything and before they simply give back money the tell you lies and do not compensate you. I want to talk to him at the top.

Author: Hussein
Review Text: Dear MoneyGram Team,I want to express my utmost satisfaction and appreciation for the outstanding service I received from MoneyGram. I recently had the opportunity to utilize your services, and I am pleased to say that my experience exceeded all expectations.First and foremost, I was impressed by the ease and convenience of using MoneyGram. The process of initiating a money transfer was incredibly straightforward, and the user-friendly interface of your website made it a breeze to navigate through the necessary steps. I was pleasantly surprised by the clarity of instructions and the intuitive design, which made the entire process efficient and hassle-free.Furthermore, I was delighted by the speed and efficiency with which my transaction was processed. The money transfer was completed within a remarkably short period, and the funds were readily available to the recipient, allowing me to fulfill my financial obligations without any delays. The promptness of the service truly impressed me and demonstrated MoneyGram's commitment to delivering a reliable and efficient service.I must also commend your customer support team for their exceptional assistance throughout the process. I had a few inquiries regarding the transaction, and the support staff were not only quick to respond but also displayed a high level of professionalism and expertise. They addressed my concerns with patience and provided me with the necessary guidance, leaving me feeling confident and well-supported throughout the entire process.Lastly, I would like to highlight the security measures implemented by MoneyGram. As someone who values the safety of my financial transactions, I was relieved to see the robust security protocols in place. MoneyGram's commitment to protecting customer information and ensuring the secure transfer of funds instilled a great deal of trust in me as a customer.Overall, my experience with MoneyGram has been nothing short of exceptional. From the user-friendly platform to the efficient processing and dedicated customer support, every aspect of your service has been remarkable. I would like to express my sincere gratitude to the entire MoneyGram team for their unwavering commitment to providing an outstanding service.I will not hesitate to recommend MoneyGram to my friends, family, and colleagues who require a reliable and efficient money transfer service. Thank you once again for the fantastic experience.

Author: Anthony Long
Review Text: What was done well was that the money eventually got there quickly and efficiently. The options on the covering information could, however, have been more wide-ranging and appropriate to difficult target countries. In particular, certain regimes are sensitive to "purpose of funds" and "source of funds" but MoneyGram's lists of these are very limited.  Further, MoneyGram sends no confirmation  that the money sent has been picked up by the recipient, making it difficult for the sender to keep up-to-the-minute records.

Author: Cairo
Review Title: I'm very happy with the convenience for…
Review Text: I'm very happy with the convenience for the mobile app. However there seems to be some problem with some of the moneygram agents when it comes retrieving funds. My app showed funds was available and ready to be picked up almost immediately. Yet my recipient had trouble finding and agent with enough cash to complete the transaction. We're talking about $75 usd and him visiting more than 3 different locations. There's definitely a problem with vetting process used by moneygram in allowing someone be declared an agent, but at the same not being able to fulfill minimal transaction. And again we're talking multiple locations and $75 usd.

Author: Don Ugwudiobi
Review Title: Been Using MoneyGram For Over 26 Years Today.
Review Text: Listen! MoneyGram never pay me a dime to write this review. This is 100% based on my experience with them over so many years. Therefore, if you want to know the truth and you believe in the truth; then read below--ok:-I've been using MoneyGram for over 26 years now and I will continue to use them for all my money transfers overseas because of the following reasons:1. they're user-friendly2. cheaper than other money transfers out there3. super fast4. there cyber-security encryption is top-notch.5. excellent customer service, just call them for anything 24/7, they are there to resolve any issue(s) that you might have.6. above-all, the more you use their services the more you get bonus points that you can convert and use to pay for a new money-transfer.I will never leave MoneyGram unless if they stop to exist which will never happen because they are very strong, reliable, and trust-worthy.That's it for now and Bravo MoneyGram!Mr. D. UgwudiobiNational Security & Alarm Installers Co. Ltd.718-760-9305

Review Title: i liked the quickness of the response…
Review Text: i liked the quickness of the response to inputting material into the website.  I found for the most part transfers ran smoothly.  Only once did i have a problem with money transfer being "sent, in process, and received" when it was not.  It was sent at 1025 am and showed received at 525 am.  The recieveing party did not pick it up before it was sent obviously and never did get this money.   she did get the other transactions the day before and that same afternoon but not this transfer.  I have not had a resolution to this incident yet.  The "live chat" people were pleasant and started a "ticket" to resolve it.  I personally prefer to be able to talk to a "live person" to decrease time interaction and be able to answer and ask questions quickly.     Overall, i have been satisfied with the process

Author: UAJ
Review Title: Terrible treatment from Moneygram for loyal customer
Review Text: I have been using Moneygram to send money abroad to needy friends for some time now. I have found it easy and convenient and cheaper than other methods.Recently however I was utterly disappointed and very upset about how I was treated after trying to query a refund for a cancelled transaction which to this day I have not received. It is not just about the refund, but more so that Moneygram showed no concern, care or consideration. They didn't even say sorry. They couldn't see it from my point of view at all and there didn't seem to be any recourse to a higher authority. I contacted customer services several times and all they kept repeating, like a broken record was "the refund has been issued from our side, please check with your bank"Me: "I have checked with my bank, and they are not holding it back, nor have they stolen it, nor have I. I can send you my statement. No refund has been received. Can you provide me with proof that moneygram has sent the refund please?"Moneygram: "the refund has been issued from our side, please check with your bank."Me: "could I please speak with a supervisor?"Moneygram : "the supervisor will tell you the same thing."Which lo and behold they did.It has been 21 days since the transaction was cancelled. The refund was only for a mere (for moneygram) £100. I have received no proof the refund was issued, nor is the refund anywhere to be found.Also just to add, I had to cancel the transaction because my receiver tried to collect from three different sites and was refused. Again this was something new, as they have not had any problems before collecting money.Very upset by whole experience. Really didn't expect this treatment.So Moneygram replied to my review (19/05/23) but as everyone can see they mention nothing about refunding the money or resolving the issue. If i could give a zero star rating I would.

Review Title: The update is not a good idea
Review Text: Before the update of the moneygram app I had the option of selecting debit card deposit as my receive method, I had no issues my money reached in minutes. Since the update I no longer see the option of debit card deposit and my money is still not where it's suppose to be. I've been waiting for over 5 business days. This change/ updated spoiled up my business. My bills are due and they can't be paid on time due to this sudden update. There was no message or warning to say that this update was going to happen. I'm sure you'll be losing alot of customers because of this. This is my worst experience ever and I've been using moneygram for over a year now.

Review Title: I always use MoneyGram for my money…
Review Text: I always use MoneyGram for my money transactions but the last time I sent money to my mother they gave a very hard time collecting MY hard earned money,she almost didn't get it. My question is,why does MoneyGram need to know so much PERSONAL information when collecting (especially when they can clearly see that you've been collecting money atleast once every month)? It's ridiculous. The last time I sent my mother money they asked what she was going to do with the money, still too personal but fine, she stated and the still wanted a quotation. Told her that next time when she returns, they're gonna need to see the receipt for the said quotation.After tgey had her back and forth in the sun and she doesn't own a car. If this continues to happen I will not be using MoneyGram anymore. Too much hassle to collect my own money. And the worst part of it was that I was present there as proof that it was a legit transfer? I did all of that because I couldn't just send the money to myself.

Review Title: They are revolving. I will try to using MoneyGram again
Review Text: MoneyGram finally listen to their customers but in indirectly way: Trustpilot.I am glad to receive SMS alert back for my transfers after being ignored for a while, even "two" or "three" whiles until Trustpilot chosen to reach out doing survey with me.I really wants to thank Trustpilot rather than themselves.1. Would you mind to let MoneyGram knows that they should not put any further Formula 1 racing cars on their mobile app main page: It is not really related but in fact it is contradicting to the way you wait for foreign amount reflected after you backspace 3rd digit of the USD amount to re-enter another one.For example, when we type USD 258, it will show another amount in foreign currency, then you change your mind, you want to send USD 255, it will pause a bit then jumping around with another number and the USD field acts like glitching.I do not know this is because my iPhone 6s with iOS version 15.7.5 installed is too old or my internet speed is too slow or something else. But you can always try testing it yourself.2. Fee: their fee is almost one of the best among others. This is the reason I am still here to do survey about them. I also wish they can find some ways to enhance the appearance of fee structure because it now looks like a little bit confusing.

Author: Ken
Review Title: Please let us setup payments in the foreign currency
Review Text: I do a monthly sending of money to Jamaica in the same amount in Jamaican dollars. Money gram is great to send the $$ and the web site is easy to use. But there are two things you can do much  better. 1) When I set up the amount to send, I have to inpu9t the amount  in US $ and do the conversion myself.  You give the conversion rate, but why can't I just put in the Jamaican $ amount and you do the conversion. I used to be able to do it this way, but no more. 2) As I send the same Jamaican $ amount every month, I assume because of  my point #1, I can not set it up as a recurring payment as when I tried that, it would set it up as the same payment in $US and not $Jamaican. So I have to set up the payment every month as a one time payment. I manage, but it would be much easier if I could do #1 &2 in the foreign currency

Author: Abdallah Harmoush
Review Text: Monegram is one of, if not, the best money transfer company in the globe. The App is simple and straightforward to use so users can easily send money for cash pick up or to a bank account.Moneygram support team never disappoint, every single time i call them they answer instantly and more than happy to sort any problem. Have been a customer for 4 years now and couldn't be happier with the service.The last thing i would really like to mention is that Moneygram should take into consideration the situation of Lebanon rather than taking an advantage and seeing this an opoortunity to make more money as the country is struggling economically and most of people are relying on money transfers from abroad.Therefore, Moneygram could see this as a  marketing strategy to attract more customers by reducing their transfer fees or amplifying exchange rates when sending money to Lebanon. For fact, Lebanon is the second largest country for receiving money and hence, this would increase the company profit as well as would tremendously help the poor people of Lebanon.

Author: Jan Vandenhove
Review Text: I had serious problems with Western Union and I had to find an alternative really fast. After a little googling I decided to give Moneygram a go. I tried a little amount just to be sure and it went perfectly well. I did a bigger second transfer while the receiver (my traveling girlfriend) was waiting at the pick-up location in Cambodia and 3 minutes after I finished the payment with MasterCard the money was available. My ID verification (less than 15 minutes) and the transfer itself were very easy and felt way more professional than WU. I received an email from Moneygram shortly after she received the cash that the money has been picked up. I didn't need customer service so I can't comment on that. I don't think that you can contact them by phone in case of a problem. With WU you can, but it takes a lot of time and for me, it turned out completely useless.

Author: Vasile Oros
Review Text: My brother sent me money, from Congo, to UK.I've been asked to send to Congo my passport photo.  I did.I got my number, the code, the name...etc...everything what I needed to pick up my money. But once arived at the post office in UK,they refused to give my money until I go to their Web site, again to upload a photo from my passport in their system .So , how many photos you need to upload, to call, to walk to their office to get my own money?!What is wrong with this system.?!Last time I use this service, and I will urge everyone to avoid this company. Poor service,  poor customer service...Thumb DOWN...Zero stars.And after 1 hour,  I  am still waiting for their reply...Avoid receiving money with this company. Waste of time and energy...

Author: GT
Review Text: DO NOT USE MONEYGRAM. TRIED TO SEND JUST £20 TO MY OWN ACCOUNT IN THAILAND. FUNDS HAVE NOT ARRIVED AND NO REPLY FROM MONEYGRAM AFTER 5 DAYS. IVE JUST SENT A SECOND TRANSFER THROUGH REMITLY WHICH ARRIVED ALMOST IMMEDIATELY.Since this review, I was refunded over one week later, so I tried WISE, which was even faster than Remitly. The transfer took mere seconds. I would fully recommend Wise.

Author: Luhenga
Review Title: Protect your business by doing right
Review Text: Time and time again I have tried to bring this issue to your attention by calling moneygram on the phone with no success. This is about international transactions in the Congo DRC,where everytime my receivers always have a problem getting the money I sent. They are always rejected for the name. They always want them to change their names certain kind if way,in fact moneyGram agent way. Worst case scenario,I sent my son money online where I don't have to write his information since I sent him hundred times before,one time they complicated him and brought the same nonsense issue of name not being correct. After they wanted me to change the name their way,keep in mind this is the same name I've sent money to before,after changing their way,my son went back there and got rejected that the same change they requested to be made was not the right name. I was forced to cancel the transaction and was still charged the fee and that happened 3 times with two others family members. MoneyGram is known in Congo DRC as a very complicated and stressful place for money transfer. Everyone who ask for money insist to be sent via western union.

Called the customer service for refund I spent about one hour with transfer from regular employee to to top manager incharge for refund of $15 they couldn’t do it wasn’t about $15 I felt I shouldn’t have paid for transaction that I couldn’t complete and it was the App issue .
